column4: noob here. i want to install a package called kmenc15. but i keep getting E: Unable to locate package kmenc15. can anyone help me?
noob here. i want to install a package called kmenc15. but i keep getting E: Unable to locate package kmenc15. can anyone help me?
it doesn't appear to be in the repositoories
what are you trying to install?... because that package is not in the default repos.
kmenc15
why ar eyou trying to install it i mean.. is it a dependency of another package, or what?
can't i add backports or something like that?
i've got all "default" and a bunch of extra repos on my pc, and that package is not in my package manager
i need it to split avi files
i just checked the ubuntu-backports... that package is not there either
what about ubuntu multimedia?
what about it?
is it there?
can you not look?
where do i go to look?
no, there is no package called ubuntu multimedia
i tried medibuntu.org/ but there is no search option
i meant the multimedia reo
what exact program, are you trying to install?.. that requires this file
kmenc15 is the program
it requires mencoder
here's  a debian lenny package, it should work w/ Ubuntu.. but that's your call... http://linuxappfinder.com/package/kmenc15
my call? can it screw ubuntu up or something?
usually, no... but.. again,  your call...
